Google sheet integration

Doc link

Key changes

  1. Get sheet from one command instead of 2 (no reuse of spread object)
  2. Do not expose index, and assume no index by default
{% raw %}

                  start_row=5,
                  sheet=0)

Manual credentials

{% raw %} 
from oauth2client.service_account import ServiceAccountCredentials

scopes = [
    'https://www.googleapis.com/auth/spreadsheets',
    'https://www.googleapis.com/auth/drive'
]

credentials = ServiceAccountCredentials.from_json_keyfile_dict(
    gsheets_credentials,
    scopes=scopes
)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
gsheet_to_df(url='https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1tYseM8jnNOBgKf3v9WtLSOCbQNjYw1hABa-cL4nlwds/edit#gid=0',
                  start_row=5,
                  sheet=0, creds=credentials)
